description: Project reset initiated - RE-START command executed. Preserved deployment files and folder structure.
Step 0 complete: Default folder structure confirmed (frontend, backend, database, docs, tests, .github, scripts, customize)
Step 1 - Question 1 complete: Project idea confirmed - EduCora AI Skills Engine microservice
Step 1 - Question 2 complete: Problem statement confirmed - fragmented skill data, no single source of truth
Step 1 - Question 3 complete: Target users confirmed - Direct (employees, trainers), Indirect (via other services), System integrations (7 microservices)
Step 1 - Question 4 complete: Business goals confirmed - single source of truth, accurate tracking, personalized learning, workforce insights, data-driven decision-making
Step 1 - Question 5 complete: Vision and mission confirmed - central authoritative source, transparent data-driven development, future-ready workforce

Step 1 complete: Success metrics and constraints confirmed - flexible API performance, comprehensive metrics across performance/business/quality/adoption, constraints across technical/business/regulatory/platform
Created step_1_project_definition_summary.md - comprehensive summary of Step 1 project definition
Added authentication constraint: Each microservice integration (Directory, Assessment, Content Studio, Course Builder, Learner AI, Learning Analytics, RAG) requires its own token for connection
Created SETUP.md - comprehensive setup guide with environment variables, installation steps, token management, and troubleshooting
Updated backend/env.example to include microservice integration tokens and URLs
Updated AI technology: Skills Engine will use Google Gemini API instead of OpenAI API
Created GitHub Actions CI workflow (ci.yml). User already has deploy.yml with comprehensive deployment workflow
Removed duplicate deploy-backend.yml and deploy-frontend.yml files - user already has unified deploy.yml
Created DEPLOYMENT.md - comprehensive deployment guide with Railway, Vercel, Supabase setup and GitHub Actions configuration
Created docs/FUNCTIONAL_REQUIREMENTS.md - comprehensive list of 11 functional requirement categories with detailed sub-requirements

Updated requirement 6: Split into two separate requirements - #6 Competency Retrieval for Dynamic Taxonomy Enrichment (Course Builder) and #7 Competency Lookup for Verified Skills Access (Content Studio/Learner AI). Renumbered subsequent requirements.
Renamed requirement 5 from 'Course Exam Processing' to 'Update User Profile'

Merged requirements 3 (Baseline Exam Processing) and 5 (Update User Profile) into single requirement 3 (Update User Profile) with common profile update process and separate flows for Baseline Exam and Course Exam. Renumbered subsequent requirements.

Merged requirements 5 and 8: Moved External Knowledge Discovery (requirement 8) into requirement 5 as sub-section 5.2, since they serve the same purpose (dynamic taxonomy enrichment for Course Builder). Renumbered subsequent requirements (now 8-10 instead of 9-11).
Updated requirement 5.2 to clarify that External Knowledge Discovery is triggered by the API endpoint (5.1), not a standalone endpoint
Fixed requirement numbering: Changed requirement 10 (Learning Analytics) to 9, and requirement 11 (RAG Integration) to 10, to match table of contents

Created docs/USER_STORIES_AND_BUSINESS_LOGIC.md - comprehensive documentation of 13 user stories (Employees, Trainers, System Integrations) and 6 business logic flows (Taxonomy Initialization, User Profile Creation, Baseline Exam Processing, Post-Course Exam Processing, On-Demand Skill Discovery, External Data Integration)

Created docs/NON_FUNCTIONAL_REQUIREMENTS.md - 4 NFRs: Performance (Gap Analysis <1s), Scalability (100,000+ users), Security & Audit (audit trail), Data Trust Priority (Assessment > Certification > Claims/AI)

Created docs/AI_CAPABILITIES.md - 4 AI capabilities using Google Gemini API: Knowledge Building & Taxonomy Construction, Data Extraction & Initial Profile Mapping, External Knowledge Discovery, Advanced Skill Matching & Fuzzy Search
Updated AI technology specification: Using two Gemini models - Flash (fast operations) and Deep-Search (complex operations). Updated AI_CAPABILITIES.md with model assignments for each capability.

Removed 'Advanced Skill Matching and Fuzzy Search' section (section 4) from docs/AI_CAPABILITIES.md - Skills Engine does not use AI for skill matching and fuzzy search functionality. Updated table of contents, summary table, and implementation considerations accordingly.

Created docs/FEATURE_ARCHITECTURE.md - Step 3 complete: Feature Architecture with AI, External API & Design Mapping. Documented 7 system-level features mapped to frontend, backend, and database components. Includes AI integration points (3 capabilities), external API integrations (7 microservices), UI/UX design requirements, dependencies, and 5-phase rollout strategy (20 weeks).
Updated project_memory.json: Step 3 complete. Updated step_2 to reflect 3 AI capabilities (removed Advanced Skill Matching). Added step_3 with feature architecture details. Updated phase to step_3.

Removed FR-1.1.5 (Official Sources List Management) from FUNCTIONAL_REQUIREMENTS.md. Renumbered FR-1.1.6 (Persist Official Sources After AI Extraction) to FR-1.1.5. Updated all references in STEP3_FEATURE_LIST.md, USER_STORIES_AND_BUSINESS_LOGIC.md, and FEATURE_ARCHITECTURE.md.

Updated Feature 2 (Data Extraction) to use only web scraping (removed API reading). Updated FR-1.2.1 in FUNCTIONAL_REQUIREMENTS.md, Feature 2 in STEP3_FEATURE_LIST.md and STEP3_FEATURE_DETAILS.md, FLOW-1 in USER_STORIES_AND_BUSINESS_LOGIC.md, and Taxonomy Service dependencies in FEATURE_ARCHITECTURE.md.

Created docs/prompts/source_discovery_prompt.txt with detailed prompt for Feature 1 (Quality Sources Discovery). Prompt instructs AI to curate 40-50 official sources with hierarchical skills/competencies, covers multiple domains, requires JSON output matching official_sources table schema. Updated Feature 1 AI section in STEP3_FEATURE_DETAILS.md to reference the prompt file and describe expected output format.

Created docs/prompts/semantic_extraction_prompt.txt with detailed prompt for Feature 2 (Data Extraction, Understanding & Hierarchy Construction). Prompt instructs AI to perform deep semantic extraction from URLs, extract hierarchical structure (Competency → Sub-competencies → Skills → Subskills → Microskills → Nanoskills), includes semantic validation to filter explanatory text, outputs JSON with sources array. Updated Feature 2 AI section in STEP3_FEATURE_DETAILS.md to reference the prompt file and describe expected output format.

Created docs/prompts/skill_validation_prompt.txt with detailed prompt for Feature 3 (Distinguish Explanation from Skill). Prompt instructs AI to act as strict JSON validator and semantic verifier, validates JSON structure and top-level format, performs per-source structural checks, validates hierarchy rules, performs semantic validation (flags non-actionable items, too short names, likely descriptions), returns validation result JSON with valid status, summary, per-source errors/warnings/semantic flags. Updated Feature 3 AI section in STEP3_FEATURE_DETAILS.md to reference the prompt file and describe expected output format.

Separated Feature 7 (Normalize Extracted Skills & Competencies) and Feature 8 (Map Skills to Competencies) from original combined feature. Feature 6 updated to only extract (no normalization, no mapping). Created Feature 7 details with AI normalization using Gemini Flash. Created Feature 8 details with database mapping (no AI). Updated STEP3_FEATURE_LIST.md numbering (Features 7-55 renumbered). Updated STEP3_FEATURE_DETAILS.md with Features 5-8 details.

Created docs/prompts/skill_extraction_from_profile_prompt.txt with prompt for Feature 6 (Extract Skills from Raw Data). Prompt instructs AI to extract professional SKILLS and COMPETENCIES from raw text, filters out company names/locations, returns JSON with competencies and skills arrays. Updated Feature 6 AI section in STEP3_FEATURE_DETAILS.md to reference the prompt file and describe expected output format (raw extraction only, no normalization or mapping).

Created docs/prompts/normalization_prompt.txt with prompt for Feature 7 (Normalize Extracted Skills & Competencies). Prompt instructs AI to clean and standardize competency and skill names with 9 normalization rules (lowercase, remove spaces/punctuation/special symbols, replace dashes/underscores, remove duplicate words, convert accented characters, prefer full forms, return unique strings). Updated Feature 7 AI section in STEP3_FEATURE_DETAILS.md to reference the prompt file and describe expected output format (normalized JSON with competencies and skills arrays).

Created docs/prompts/skill_to_competency_mapping_prompt.txt with prompt for Feature 8 (Map Skills to Competencies). Updated Feature 8 to use AI for semantic mapping instead of database lookup. Prompt instructs AI to organize skills under competencies using semantic meaning (not string matching), allows skills to belong to multiple competencies, returns JSON mapping structure. Updated Feature 8 Goal, Logic, External API, AI section (Gemini Deep-Search), Dependencies, and Telemetry in STEP3_FEATURE_DETAILS.md to reflect AI-based semantic mapping approach.

Step 6 BUILD initiated: Generated complete database schema and migrations (001_create_initial_schema.sql), backend infrastructure (config, middleware, routes, repositories, services), and mock data for API fallback. Created production-ready backend code structure with TypeScript, Express.js, PostgreSQL integration, Google Gemini AI service, error handling, authentication middleware, and all core services (Taxonomy, Profile, GapAnalysis, AI, CSVProcessing).

Generated comprehensive backend test suite following TDD approach. Created test files for repositories (TaxonomyRepository, ProfileRepository), services (TaxonomyService, ProfileService, GapAnalysisService), routes (health, webhooks, frontend), utilities (errors), and integration tests. All tests use Jest with proper mocking of database and external services. Test coverage includes unit tests, integration tests, error handling, and edge cases.

Generated complete frontend structure with React + Vite. Created Vite configuration, React app setup, routing, theme context, API client, custom hooks, and all core components (Dashboard, CompetencyCard, SkillsGapPanel, CompetencyDetailModal, CSVUpload, Header). Implemented dark emerald theme with Tailwind CSS, glassmorphism effects, responsive design, and TypeScript support. Updated package.json from Next.js to Vite with all necessary dependencies.

Generated frontend test suite using Vitest. Created test files for components (CompetencyCard, SkillsGapPanel), hooks (useUserProfile), and services (api). Set up test configuration with jsdom environment, test setup file, and coverage reporting. All tests follow React Testing Library best practices.
